Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.service

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
com.IGallinari.LastGame.service.GameService
@Service public class GameService extends Object
Service class for managing game-related operations. This includes building responses for various game views such as home, calendar, and game details.

  • Method Details

    • buildHome

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> buildHome(HomeRequest homeRequest)
      Builds and returns the home view response based on the given home request. The response varies depending on whether the user is logged in or not.
      Parameters:
      homeRequest - The request data for building the home view.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the home view response.

    • buildCalendar

      public CalendarResponse buildCalendar(LocalDate inputDate)
      Builds a calendar view response based on the input date.
      Parameters:
      inputDate - The date for which to build the calendar view.
      Returns:
      A CalendarResponse containing calendar view data.

    • buildGameDetails

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> buildGameDetails(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int id)
      Builds a game details view response for a specific game.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The token request for user authentication.
      id - The ID of the game for which to build the details view.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the game details view response.

    • buildPastGame

      public PastGameResponse buildPastGame(Integer idUser, Game game)
      Builds a game details view response for a past game.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user (if logged in).
      game - The Game object representing the past game.
      Returns:
      A PastGameResponse containing details of the past game.

    • buildNextGame

      public NextGameResponse buildNextGame(Integer idUser, Game game)
      Builds a game details view response for an upcoming game.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user (if logged in).
      game - The Game object representing the upcoming game.
      Returns:
      A NextGameResponse containing details of the upcoming game.
